page.description: The menus that are shown in Query by Example can now be internationalized.

section.description: A new property in the Query-by-Example Row section allows you to specify if the entries in the menu should be wrapped in Language Tags (..) or Text Dictionary tags (..).

Once you have wrapped the menu strings in tags, you can go to the Language definitions or Text dictionary properties section in the Grid builder to define the replacement strings for each language you want to support.
